page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: MOST OF THE LAND IN OUR AREA IS USED FOR MIXED FARMING. THE MAIN FARMS ARE: 1. CASTLE FARM 200 ACRES MR ADKINS RENTS IT FROM HIS FATHER. THE SOIL IS IRONSTONE AND RED IN COLOUR. HIS MAIN CROPS ARE BARLEY, WHEAT, POTATOES AND RAPE. HE HAS WORKERS TO HELP HIM ONLY AT HARVEST TIME. HE IS CONCERNED ABOUT THE OVER-USE OF CHEMICALS IN FARMING. 2. SEALE'S FARM 215 ACRES MR ASTLE AND HIS MOTHER OWN THE FARM, USE OLD FASHIONED METHODS AND SELL THEIR PRODUCE IN BANBURY. HE GROWS BARLEY AND HAS ABOUT 70 CATTLE AND 500 SHEEP. 3. MAWLES FARM, OVERTHORPE 150 ACRES MR MAWLE HAS AN ARABLE FARM AND GROWS CEREAL CROPS AND RAPE. HIS NEW COMBINE HARVESTER COST #80,000. HE HAS 3 WORKERS ON THE FARM, AND RENTS OUT 10 ACRES.
